mapper.select: SELECT avg(r.difficulty) difficulty, count(v.no) count, v.part_no partNo FROM (select t.review_no, t.video_no, difficulty FROM routine t INNER JOIN (select no FROM review WHERE user_id = #{id}) w ON t.review_no = w.no) r LEFT OUTER JOIN video v ON r.video_no = v.no GROUP BY v.part_no;
